comments.body: Probably fine, but I guess this could be `FENCED_GROUP_INSTANCE_ID` to match the config name.
Yea, I think it should be fine to make the error name concise.

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +305,309 @@            PreferredLeaderNotAvailableException::new),
    GROUP_MAX_SIZE_REACHED(81, "The consumer group has reached its max size.", GroupMaxSizeReachedException::new),
    FENCED_INSTANCE_ID(82, "The broker rejected this static consumer since " +
            "another consumer with the same group.instance.id has registered with a different member.id.",
            FencedInstanceIdException::new);

comments.body: Is it worth adding a note about the use of REPLICA_NOT_AVAILABLE below? I think we are effectively deprecating its usage in this PR.

diffHunk:

            BrokerNotAvailableException::new),
